alert.note: Alert for Panola (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern De Soto, south central Caddo Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and southeastern Panola Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Logansport, or 19 miles east of Carthage, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Stonewall, Logansport, Keachi, Longstreet, Gloster, Keat Chie, Frierson, Kickapoo, Keithville, Kingston and Reeds Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern and northeastern Texas.
